skills.name: DEPARTED
desc: • Deals physical damage to all enemies.
• Grant Regen to all allies for 1 turn.
• Remove Crave effects from all allies and Heal all allies by 15% of their Max HP for every instance of Immunity or Perfect Immunity present on the enemy team.

skills.name: GANG RULE
desc: • Remove Negative Effects from all allies, including Silver Effects.
• Inflict Crave on all enemies for 2 turns.
• Heal all allies by 25% of their Max HP for every instance of Perfect Immunity on the enemy and Remove Perfect Immunity from the enemy.

skills.name: MOMENTUM
desc: Cleanse and Grant a Random Beneficial Effect to self or a random ally every turn.
